title: Jawadu
author: Jawadu
created_time: August 14, 2022, 08:15:24 AMLast edit: August 14, 2022, 10:51:47 AM by Jawadu
content: Rice Protocol is one of the tokens that stands under the auspices of a new blockchain, namely Bitgert Chain, Rice protocol is a platform that was built as an economic platform, where people can exchange, create images and sell according to their wishes to meet the financial balance.Learn more about Rice Protocol1. Bounty Campaign Starts on: 14 August - 17 September (5 weeks)2. $7000 worth of Rice Protocol will be distributed within 1 month after the bounty is over.3. Complete tasks and make reports every week in this thread! 4. Connect with Rice Protocol in social media;- Twitter: https://twitter.com/protocolrice- Telegram group: https://t.me/rice_pro- Learn more about Rice Protocol: https://www.riceprotocol.org/5. Tokens will be distributed depending on the quality of your work.6. Spammers, cheaters, bots, and similar participants will be banned immediately!7. Follow all the bounty groups/channels to get support and to stay updated;- Rice Protocol Bounty: https://t.me/riceprotocol_bounty- Foxcampaigns Group: https://t.me/foxcampaigns- Foxcampaigns Channel: https://t.me/foxannouncementsCode:Proof of authentication;Telegram username:Campaigns applied:Rice wallet address:$7000 worth of Rice Protocol tokens will be distributed in this bounty. Only participants with quality work(s) will be rewarded;- Twitter campaign: 30%- Video Campaign:  20- Article campaign: 20%- Telegram campaign: 20%- Reserved: 10%Tokens:1 - 10 stakes depending on the video quality.Rules:- Videos must have at least 200 views to qualify.- We accept original videos only with at least 3 minutes.- Only English language is accepted in videos.- Write a good description about Rice Protocol in your video. - Videos with no user's voice will not be accepted.- Attach Rice Protocol links in your video description.- Publish your video on YouTube, TikTok, etc.- Only 2 videos per person are allowed.JOIN CAMPAIGN   -   SPREADSHEESTS Tokens:1 - 10 stakes depending on the article quality.Rules:- Articles must have at least 50 views to qualify.- We accept original articles only with at least 500 words.- Only English language is accepted in articles.- Submit articles on Medium, Steem, Linkedin, ReadCash.  - Visit [https://www.riceprotocol.org/]Rice Protocol[/url] to learn more about it and write your articles.- Attach Rice Protocol links in your articles.- Only 2 articles per person are allowed.JOIN CAMPAIGN   -   SPREADSHEESTS Stakes:- 300 to 1000 followers: 4 stakes per week- 1001 to 2500 followers: 8 stakes per week- 2501 to 5500 followers: 12 stakes per week- 5501 to 10,000 followers: 16 stakes per week- 10,000+ followers: 20 stakes per weekRules:1. Have at least 300 followers to participate.2. Must follow Rice Protocol Twitter account: @protocolrice3. Make 1 post and 1 repost, per day. Submit report weekly to receive stakes.4. Minimum of 10 posts per week (5 tweets, 5 retweets)5. Use these hashtags; #riceprotocol #ricetoken #foxcampaigns #BRC20 #cryptoJOIN CAMPAIGN   -   SPREADSHEESTS Code:[ Twitter Report ]Twitter Profile Link:Week #:Tweet Link #1:Tweet Link #2:Tweet Link #3:Tweet Link #4:Tweet Link #5:Retweet Link #1: Retweet Link #2:Retweet Link #3:Retweet Link #4:Retweet Link #5:Stakes:- 1 quality post: 1 stake.- 20 one-time stakes for wearing Rice Protocol avatar and name.- Wear the Avatar until the end of the campaign and you will get stakes.- Download AvatarRules:1. Must join Rice Protocol Telegram group: https://t.me/rice_pro2. Write posts in the official Rice Protocol group (only quality posts accepted)3. If you write any spam message you will be banned immediately4. Max posts per day: 2 , Max posts per week: 105. You can ask questions about Rice Protocol in official group, but do not Spam!6. DO NOT USE HASHTAGS IN YOUR TELEGRAM POSTS!JOIN CAMPAIGN   -   SPREADSHEESTS Code:[ Telegram Report ]Telegram Profile Link:Week #:Post Link #1:Post Link #2:Post Link #3:Post Link #4:Post Link #5:Post Link #6:Post Link #7:Post Link #8:Post Link #9:Post Link #10:Week 01: Aug 14 - Aug 20Week 02: Aug 21 - Aug 27Week 03: Aug 28 - Sep 03Week 04: Sep 04 - Sep 10Week 05: Sep 11 - Sep 17Designed & Managed by Fox Campaigns
